page.title: 18Societies in Wrea Green p.2
page.content: The Wrea Green branches of Dr. Barnados N.S.P.C.C. and R.N.L.I. are all formed to raise money for their National Institution. As a result of their efforts over a thousand pounds a year is sent to various charities. The "Friends of Wrea Green School" was formed to raise money for the village school which is spent on educational equipment but also to organise social events for the families. There are no village organisations for boys of primary school age but for girls there the Guides, the Brownies and the Girls Friendly Society. For children of pre-school age there is the Tuesday break and also a Play group. The men of the village find their recreational meeting place is the pub overlooking the Green - The Grapes!
